comments.body:
Calling setState on every ScrollUpdateNotification is expensive because that will trigger this (big) widget to rebuild every frame of the scroll.  It would be more efficient to make _selectedIndex into an AnimationController and use SlideTransition rather than FractionalTranslation on line 456.  Similarly, _AllSectionsView could become an AnimatedWidget and listen to the animation as well.

(You'd never actually tell the _selectedIndex animation to go forward(), you'd just set the value and rely on that trigger the widgets listening to the animation.)
